location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 31/13 MUBARAK BIN NASIR AL KHALIFA OF SAUDI ARABIA.'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is also present in parallel between ff 2-6; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled, and are located in the same position as the main sequence

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence concerning the request of Mubarak bin Nasir Al Khalifa (based in Saudi Arabia) for financial assistance from Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifa, Ruler of Bahrain. The request was declined.The correspondents are Arnold Crawshaw Galloway, Political Agent, Kuwait; Cornelius James Pelly, Political Agent, Bahrain; Mubarak bin Nasir Al Khalifa; Salman bin Hamad, Ruler of Bahrain; Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Bahrain Government.
